text: how often does everyone blog for their agency? I've been having a "writer's block" for content ideas and would love to see what everyone else has been writing about while I've been stuck (only if you feel comfortable sharing of course)
everyone on our team blogs at least once per month
out target right now is 20 blogs monthly
<@U25C65C3S> Do the individuals pick what they want to write about? Are topics provided by someone else for them to choose from? Just curious how you keep it relevant to campaigns/topic clusters/etc?
we provide the topic direction and the parameters
Thanks <@U25C65C3S>! Our entire team blogs as well...we focus on our own topic clusters and I've had a hard time coming up with development topics that are also relevant to marketers
ours tend to write about the technical aspects of UX and SEO.
For marketers, development is a mystery in some cases. Great opportunity to lift up the kimono.
